title: The Runaway Hug
description: "Mummy," said Lucy, "can I have a hug before I go to bed? I promise I'll give it back."Lucy shares a hug with everyone in her family. Along the way it becomes softer, sleepier, bigger, even peanut-buttery. But when the hug runs away, Lucy discovers that it's not so easy to get it back.
author: Nick Bland
